content.question: An electron is located <math alttext="1.5 centimeters" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1.5</mn><mo>⁢</mo><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>c</mi><mi>m</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> above a wire with current <math alttext="2.5 amperes" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2.5</mn><mo>⁢</mo><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>, as shown above. The wire exerts a force of <math alttext="1.3 times 10 to the power negative 16, newtons" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1.3</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>16</mn></mrow></msup><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>N</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> on the electron. What are the magnitude and direction of the velocity of the electron?

choices.label: <math alttext="1.1 times 10 to the power 7, meters per second" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1.1</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup><mfrac><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> to the left and parallel to the wire

<math alttext="1.4 times 10 to the power 7, meters per second" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1.4</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup><mfrac><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> to the right and parallel to the wire

<math alttext="2.1 times 10 to the power 7, meters per second" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2.1</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup><mfrac><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> to the left and parallel to the wire

<math alttext="2.4 times 10 to the power 7, meters per second" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2.4</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup><mfrac><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> to the right and parallel to the wire

content.answer: <math alttext="2.4 times 10 to the power 7, meters per second" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2.4</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup><mfrac><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> to the right and parallel to the wire

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
